column2: BlackRock Income Trust, Inc. (the Trust) is a diversified, closed-end management investment company. The Trust's investment objective is to provide current income and capital appreciation. The Trust seeks to achieve its investment objective by investing at least 75% of its managed assets in bonds that are investment grade quality at the time of investment. The Trust's portfolio composition includes corporate bonds, the United States treasury obligations, preferred securities, non-agency mortgage-backed securities, asset-backed securities, the United States Government sponsored agency securities, municipal bonds, foreign agency obligations, floating rate loan interests and short-term securities. The Trust invests in non-government spread sectors, including investment grade credit, high yield credit, commercial mortgage-backed securities (CMBS) and non-agency residential mortgage-backed securities (MBS). The Trust's investment advisor is BlackRock Advisors, LLC.
